summary: Completed i18n centralization, asset cleanup, and TypeScript/linting fixes. Centralized i18n to src/lib/i18n.ts, removed duplicate src/i18n.ts, updated all imports. Deleted 4 unused assets (screenshots, old page images). Removed unused React imports from 10+ files. Fixed broken imports. Restored App.tsx from git and updated to use organized component structure. Build successful. Translation keys analysis shows 295 keys total, all locales consistent.
current_status: i18n centralized, assets cleaned, TypeScript/linting fixed. Build successful. App.tsx restored and updated. Ready for final verification.
